channel.title: Monster Drop Problems
channel.description: okay sometimes when we kill monsters the wrong person gets the drop.. and sometimes it doesnt show up for like a minute any1 know why?

item.title: Monster Drop Problems
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

I have experienced this problem on another server once. My theory is that you hit over the monster’s hp (typically a very high hit in a blue splash) with a spell and then either the caster will get the drop if they continue to cast spells, or the drop will appear for no-one, and then appear when the monster spawns again for everyone to see. I don’t this there is really any way to solve this

Read full topic
